comment: Last night on , Kanye West was called a token negro and a dumb negro. I want you guys to imagine if those words were EVER uttered on . CNN has finally committed to going full blown RACIST. They want their slaves back
amr:

                        :op2 "West"))
            :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (n2 / negro

                  :op2 (n3 / negro

                              :time (e / ever))))
            :snt3 (c2 / commit-01

                  :ARG2 (g2 / go-08
